title: High Current LCR Meter Test System
subtitle: 3 models: 5400L5 (10 Hz to 5 MHz), 5400L8 (10 Hz to 8 MHz), and 5400L10 (10 Hz to 10 MHz)

paragraphs: The 5400L Machine is a LCR Meter for high current test system. The DC Bias Current source WK3265B machines are connected to the Bias Adapter of the 5400 directly with a dedicated wiring system. This makes it is easier to set up and maintain the system.

applications: AC parameter and DC resistance measurements

features.title: Versatile Testing Modes
features.description: Includes Meter Mode, MultiBias Mode, and Calibration Mode as standard, with an optional Graph Mode for comprehensive testing capabilities

features.title: High Current Testing
features.description: External DC bias current source capability up to 250A/1MHz or 600A/500kHz, utilizing 10 or 12 x 3265B DC Bias Units for high current inductance testing

features.title: Advanced Measurement Accuracy
features.description: Basic accuracy of 0.05% and measurement frequency range from 10Hz to 10MHz, ensuring precise and reliable results

features.title: Simultaneous Parameter Measurement
features.description: Single trigger operation produces both AC parameter and DC Resistance measurements, displaying up to 4 different parameters at up to 3 different spot frequencies simultaneously

features.title: Comprehensive Correction Features
features.description: Offers Open/Short Circuit Trims, HF Compensation, and Load Compensation in Boost/Normal mode for accuracy and stability

features.title: Efficient Operation Interface
features.description: Features a user-friendly UI, allowing for simple setup and operation

features.title: Saturation I(Sat) Testing
features.description: Capable of performing saturation current testing using curve sweeping or the MultiBias fast test mode

features.title: Automatic Level Control (ALC)
features.description: Maintains constant voltage or current at the Device Under Test for accurate measurements

features.title: Flexible Connectivity
features.description: Remote control capabilities via GPIB, LAN, and USB interfaces for easy integration into existing test setups

features.title: Energy-Saving Features
features.description: Smart switching mode automatically shuts down the 3265B bias source units when operating in Standalone Mode, conserving energy

features.title: Upgradeable Software
features.description: Ensures the system remains up-to-date with the latest features and improvements. Technical support is readily available, fast, and convenient

specifications.heading: AC Drive
content: Automatic Level Control (ALC): ON or OFF
Source Resistance: Normal Mode: 50Ω; Boost Mode: 25Ω
Maintains constant voltage or constant current at the Device Under Test

specifications.heading: External DC Bias Current using 3265B or 3265BQ DC Bias Units

options.title: Firmware Options
items: 1J5400OPD: Data Logging - Measurement and results storing in real time

options.title: Internal Hardware
items: 1J5400DCBIASKIT: One interface board and cables to control 6 x 3265B DC Bias Units

options.title: External Hardware
